plays.text: Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for Hooking Martin Straka
Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Marty Murray and Eric Weinrich
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Hooking Mark Recchi served by Dick Tarnstrom
Penalty to Claude Lapointe 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Steve McKenna served by Tony Amonte
Penalty to Tomas Surovy 2 minutes for Tripping Marcus Ragnarsson served by Tomas Surovy
Penalty to Dan Focht 2 minutes for High Sticking Mark Recchi served by Dan Focht
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Interference Michal Rozsival served by Keith Primeau
Penalty to Shawn Heins 2 minutes for Holding Tony Amonte served by Shawn Heins
Penalty to Chris Therien 2 minutes for High Sticking Ville Nieminen served by Chris Therien
Penalty to Donald Brashear 2 minutes for Elbowing Steve McKenna served by Donald Brashear
Goal scored by Michal Handzus unassisted
Penalty to Dick Tarnstrom 2 minutes for Holding Tony Amonte served by Dick Tarnstrom
Goal scored by Marty Murray assisted by Jeremy Roenick and Dmitry Yushkevich
